messages.subject: Hello from WXXI
messages.message: Hey man we really like your work. We've noticed you've been publishing a lot of stuff around music in the city of Rochester. We were wondering if you'd be interested in being our official correspondant. We offer special training so please let us know if you are interested. Best wishes - WXXI

messages.subject: Hello from WDKX
messages.message: Hello from DKX! We really like the work you're doing around the music scene in Rochester. Keep up the good work!

messages.subject: Welcome to Yellr!
messages.message: You are now a part of a local community working to bring the latest news. Have a look around and get a feel for everything

badges.name: First Report
badges.description: Congratulations! You've contributed to your neighborhood by making your first post with Yellr!

badges.name: Daily Reporter
badges.description: That's a whole week straight of quality posts, you're doing great. Keep it up!

badges.name: To Print
badges.description: Congratulations! Your contribution has been approved by one of our moderators!
